title: Vaporetto Evolution Kit (english)
description:
Polti, creators of Vaporetto steam cleaning, are proud to showcase the Evolution Kit steam generator with safety cap and anti-limescale and anti-corrosion aluminium alloy boiler.
Professional iron included.

asset.author: Polti Spa
asset.description:
Polti, creators of Vaporetto steam cleaning, are proud to showcase the Evolution Kit steam generator with safety cap and anti-limescale and anti-corrosion aluminium alloy boiler.
Professional iron included.

transcripts: Polti creators of vaporetto steam cleaning are proud to showcase the evolution kit for complete natural home cleaning with steam. Due to the power and temperature of steam under pressure vaporetto steam cleaning is the ultimate natural solution for total cleaning of the home. The polti vaporetto evolution kit uses the power of vaporetto dry steam to deep clean hygienically without chemicals, easy to move with convenient wheels and a 1.3 liter capacity for cleaning all around the home lasting for up to 35 minutes. The powerful four-bar steam degreases homes deep clean surfaces neutralizing bacteria remove stubborn grime with ease and is certified to be effective against dust mites with a British Allergy Foundation seal of approval. Effective 110 grand per minute steam allows for quick and easy cleaning of sinks, taps, mirrors, baths or bathroom and shower areas and effortlessly cleans windows and refreshes curtains or upholstery. This powerful steam cleaner is ideal for cleaning car windows interiors or wheel rims and includes accessories for tackling barbecues plus a professional steam generator attachment for excellent ironing results. The vaporetto evolution kit is perfect for refreshing carpets and cleaning wooden tiled or delicate floors and is the complete cleaning product that covers your whole home providing the cleaning power and peace of mind that only a Polti product can. The vaporetto evolution kit from Polti the secret to a natural home feeling.
